'''Conspicuous Stone Walls''' are three special rock piles located in a cave under [[Tenshukaku]]. They are involved in the fourth part of [[Kamisato Ayaka]]'s [[Story Quest]], [[Lasting Promise]].

Knock on the Conspicuous Stone Wall once, four times, and seven times to open it. After completing this quest, all three walls disappear, even if they have not all been interacted with.

==Dialogue==
Interacting with the Conspicuous Stone Wall before Ayaka's Story Quest gives the following dialogue:
{{dialogue start}}
:'''Conspicuous Stone Wall:''' This wall looks a bit odd...
{{dialogue end}}
